text: Breno is a village and former municipality of the district Lugano in the canton of Ticino in Switzerland. On 13 March 2005 the former municipalities of Arosio, Breno, Fescoggia, Mugena and Vezio merged into the new municipality of Alto Malcantone. Category:Former municipalities of Ticino Category:Villages in Ticino
title: Breno, Ticino
